data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Lygosoma Hardwicke & Gray, 1827 (Squamata: Scincidae) from northeastern Cambodia, with an updated identification key to the genus Lygosoma in mainland Southeast Asia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Geissler, Peter, Hartmann, Timo, Neang, Thy (2012): A new species of the genus Lygosoma Hardwicke & Gray, 1827 (Squamata: Scincidae) from northeastern Cambodia, with an updated identification key to the genus Lygosoma in mainland Southeast Asia. Zootaxa 3190: 56-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.280057
